Wait.... Raising and lowering? Will we be able to detach the pad and and leave it resting on the pedestals at the pad like IRL? That would be soooooo cool....

yes I posted my idea hours ago.

so you can decouple, lower and drive off. then return to collect and drive it into the ocean, or leave a collection of pads sitting outside the kerbal head office lol

- - - Updated - - -

those big posts have colliders so you can rest the pad on it...
I didn't see you're earlier post... I see it now... Anyway.... AWESOME!!!

I look forward to finishing this:

will need infernal robotics and animated decouplers... I have it all figured out

Soyuz needs love
Mike so does the crawler now have a launch tower?
Wow Mike, you really are going full power on these launchpads ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) Amazing!

> 
> Mike so does the crawler now have a launch tower?

There are now 2 different pads to choose from. Shuttle and saturn type one. The saturn one is a much smoother surface and vent holes are different. Still need to make animated decoupler arm and fine tune details. Keep getting sidetracked.
